noPermission.description_embed: You do not have permission to use this command!
noPermission.description_embed_no_features: The function is currently disabled. An administrator needs to enable it for it to be usable.

queueEnd.description: The queue has ended and no playback is in progress, so Alka Hub has disconnected from the channel.

addQueue.description:
The track has been added to the queue.
**Track**: {0}

addQueuePlaylist.description:
The playlist has been added to the queue.
**Tracks added to queue**: {0}

alreadyConnect.description: Alka Hub is already connected to a voice channel and playing music.

notFound.description: The provided QUERY was not found during the search, please try again.

ready.description: Loading... Playback is about to start, enjoy your listening.

noVoice.description: This command cannot be executed unless you are connected to a voice channel.

noUserOnline.description: No user was connected to the voice channel, consequently the queue has been cleared and Alka Hub has been disconnected.

stopVoteClose.description: The player {0} has been stopped successfully. If you want to listen to music again, use **/play**.

stopVoteMessage.description:
A vote has been requested to stop the player {0}
**Votes**: {1} out of {2} required.

alreadyVoteStop.description: You have already voted, please wait for the vote to finish.

noConnectStopVote.description: You are not connected to the voice channel where Alka Hub's player is located.

noBotConnectStopVote.description: No Alka Hub player is connected to the voice channel.

NextVoteClose.description: The currently playing song has been changed to the next one.

NextVoteMessage.description:
A vote has been requested to change the currently playing song for player {0}
**Votes**: {1} out of {2} required.

alreadyVoteNext.description: You have already voted, please wait for the vote to finish.

noConnectNextVote.description: You are not connected to the voice channel where Alka Hub's player is located.

noBotConnectNextVote.description: No Alka Hub player is connected to the voice channel.
